roleset.name: cause by force of law, be obligatory
roleset.note: MANDATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mandate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from mandate.01-v predicate notes)
MANDATORY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from mandatory.01-j)

example.name: wsj likes it only in passive?
example.text: Columbia Savings& Loan Association, reeling from [thrift-accounting changes]-1 mandated *trace*-1 by Congress and the recent collapse of the junk-bond market, announced a loss for the third quarter of $226.3 million, or $11.57 a share.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I given her that option to pursue at this time , but it is clearly not mandatory , given the absence of any real presyncopal sensations .
example.arg: given the absence of any real presyncopal sensations
